name: Death&Taxes
description:
There are two certain things in life: death and taxes. It appears, both came to old man named alfred on the same day. It appears, they do not like each other. It appears, they are going to fight for Alfred's souls.

Death and taxes is a classic fighter game supposed to be played by two players on 1 keyboard, where you take upon a role of tax collector or dark ripper himself.

Controls:

Death - WSAD, V to attack, B to block

IRS officer - arrows, O to attack, P to block.

Enter - skip animation
